scripts.build:dev: parcel build src/index.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-dir dist/dev --out-file engagement-tracking-dev.js && parcel build src/index.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-dir local_testing --out-file engagement-tracking-dev.js
scripts.build: parcel build src/index.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-dir dist/local --out-file engagement-tracking-local.js && parcel build src/index.js --no-source-maps --no-minify --out-dir dist/dev --out-file engagement-tracking-dev.js && parcel build src/index.js --no-source-maps --out-dir dist/prod --out-file engagement-tracking-prod.js
scripts.rollup:build:all: dotenv -e env/.env.local npm run rollup:build && dotenv -e env/.env.src npm run rollup:build && dotenv -e env/.env.dev npm run rollup:build && dotenv -e env/.env.qa npm run rollup:build && dotenv -e env/.env.prod npm run rollup:build
